Class ChallengeActionServlet

  • java.lang.Object

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/challenge_action")
public class ChallengeActionServlet
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChallengeActionServlet

        @Autowired
public ChallengeActionServlet(com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.ChallengeActionService challengeActionService,
                                          com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.ChallengeService challengeService)
        Database access dependency injection. ChallengeActionService, ChallengeService dependency injection.
        Parameters:
        challengeActionService - calls the Challenge Action Data Access Object to interact with database.
        challengeService - calls the Challenge Service Data Access Object to interact with database.

                                                                                                                                                                              int id)

        Parameters:
        id - Id of Challenge to be used to retrieve Challenge Actions from the database.
        Returns:
